item.title: Apo ngankeu
item.description: I am an experienced scientist with a demonstrated history of working in Biomedical Research. Skilled in Biochemistry, Molecular Biology, Biotechnology, Cell Culture, Genomic Research. Experienced in nucleic acid research, gained through several years of management of next-generation sequencing experiments, projects working with micro-RNA and non-coding RNA in cancer, and forging the use of new NGS experimental techniques to explore the genetic and epigenetic mosaicism in leukemia. Professional development in Clinical Pharmacology and Applied Clinical and Pre-clinical Research, focused in the development of safe, novel, therapeutic tools, in accordance with the Good Laboratory Practices and Good Clinical Practice guidelines.
